title: New: Childish Gambino – Centipede
body:
I’ve been on a bit of a Community trip recently, and I still find it hard to get my head around the fact that Troy is **Childish Gambino**.

Anyway, having taken a bit of time out, **Donald Glover** is all set to become one of the biggest rappers in the world, and this new cut is sure to propel him to such heights. _Centipede_ is both soulful and aggressive at the same time, reminding me A LOT of College Dropout era Kanye. Check it out below.
